name: [WIP] AmiRun2
description:
-=[ Story ]=-

Here we go again, one year later there is a party and AMI has of course to be there.   That's why he sets his alarm clock to very very early so he'll be at the party on time.

The trouble already starts at home with the neighbor, just because Ami uses a bit of dynamite to open his closet.  So you have to disappear quickly and inconspicuously, grab a few beers for the road and off you go!

But it soon becomes clear something is wrong again.  Ami is attacked and shot at by strangers.  He has no choice than to arm himself and shoot them back.

-=[ Controls ]=-

AmiRun2 is a fast paced run and gun game, grab some weapons and shoot your opponents.  The story continues in each level with an introduction and an outro.  The whole game is available in 2 languages, all characters speak to Ami and he answers them with a fully localized voice output.

Control our hero with Cursor Keys or WASD or  use a compatible controller,  Fire with " CTRL " key,  Roll with " Z " or " Y "  key. Use the " X " key to activate some actions ( Talk People  or open Doors ) 

Please read the Read.me file for further informations.
